224.heading: Bolle, Frank, 1924- --Miscellanea.
224.title: "Apartment 3-G"
224.author: by Brian Kotzky
notes: Summary: Comments on the strip originated by Alex Kotzky and Nick Dallis in 1961. When Dallis died in 1991, Alex Kotzky took over the writing until he died in 1996. His son Brian then drew the strip, with writer Lisa Trusiani, until 1999, when he resigned and the art went to Frank Bolle. This article introduced by Gill Fox. Includes samples of the strip from various eras.
